actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to recognize the joint development by the State of Texas and the State of Louisiana of a recurring and environmentally sound source of energy represented by the Toledo Bend Dam and Reservoir and exempt Sabine River Authority, State of Texas, and exempt Sabine River Authority, State of Louisiana, from charges for use, occupancy, and enjoyment of certain lands of the United States within the Sabine National Forest, Texas.

summary.text: Exempts the Toledo Bend Dam and Reservoir project of Louisiana and Texas from payment of annual charges to the United States for the use of lands within the Sabine National Forest, Texas.

titles.title: A bill to recognize the joint development by the State of Texas and the State of Louisiana of a recurring and environmentally sound source of energy represented by the Toledo Bend Dam and Reservoir and exempt Sabine River Authority, State of Texas, and exempt Sabine River Authority, State of Louisiana, from charges for use, occupancy, and enjoyment of certain lands of the United States within the Sabine National Forest, Texas.
